Detailed Description

Class of EventCallback used to signal event

An object of this class is notified for each registered event to the event daemon. The notify method should be implemented in derived class in order to react to the notification. The parameter of notify is the event. The notify method could be reified.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool Util::EventCallback::do_notify ( Event &  evt  )  [pure virtual]

Call when the event occurs

Parameters:
evt [in] the event that generates the call to notify
Returns:
true if the event evt should be re-inserted in the list of events
false if the event should not be re-inserted

Implemented in Util::CounterManager, NS::Server, NetData::GlobalVariable, Stat::SendStatisticsCallback, Stat::StatisticsService, FT::CCKEventStart, FT::CheckpointServer, FT::FailureDetectorCoordinator, FT::HeartBeatDetector, and FT::TICCheckpoint.
